about_the_game:
This DLC pack adds new content to the Maid Cafe video game in the following ways:
  • A new app will appear in the in-game mobile phone
  • Viewable adult dakimakura images for 12 characters
  • Clothed and Nude dakimakura images
All content from this DLC is viewable in game once installed.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product depicts various adult female characters in lingerie or in the nude.

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

detailed_description:
This DLC pack adds new content to the Maid Cafe video game in the following ways:

All content from this DLC is viewable in game once installed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Storage: 50 MB available space
